about: Hey!  I'm Artmin, I am a Graphic Designer specializing in Illustrations and identity design. I've been exploring and experimenting with creative art since I was a child. I enjoy new and challenging projects that push and challenge me to evolve and learn in the field of design. I've had a lot of exposure in the field of design and have been working professionally for the past 6 years. I create clean, fun and appealing designs which comply with the latest design standards.

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about:
Hi there! Thank you for visiting my page.
  I specialize in logo design. I strive for simplicity and minimalism in my design style. At the same time, I try to express the essence of your company in my logos. My catchy logos are simple in the perception and can lead your business to success.
  If you need the logo design done, feel free to contact me.

  Thank you for viewing my profile. I am a graphic designer who has a lot of experience, Even so I always want to learn and give the best results for the client. I've had a vacuum of 99 Designs over the past year, and now I'm back to give the best for you.
  Do not hesitate to cooperate with me. I'm always ready for all the challenges and learning more.
  Thanks.
  Have a nice day :)

I think the passion is the most important thing in creating something. I love what I do and I promise, you will love the designs that I'm going to do for you.
  Several designs in my portfolio are available for sale. If you like any of them, just send me a message and ask for availability, or invite me to 1-to-1 project

reviews: ['We were looking for minimal design that still explains what we do. visakh123 followed our requirements and delivered. ', 'Amazing designer!', 'Visakh123 was one of the first to submit a design, and even though I ended up getting over 100 different amazing logos to choose from, I kept going back to theirs. My favorite part of our new logo is the B that turns into an elephant - very clever. Easy...', 'Visakh and I had very different opinions on what constitutes a cute baby animal face. He was very accommodating in making changes as requested and I ended up with images I am happy with. ', 'Visakh understood the brief perfectly and provided a very clever design that suits our product and conveys the perfect message for our business.  He was very quick to respond to requests for modifications and very obliging.   We highly recommend Visakh.', "Visakh123 created a great logo for us, we are happy with it. He doesn't make just something fast but he puts a concept behind it. And he'll work on it until you are 100% satisfied with it. Thank you very much!!", 'We got everything we needed from our designer.  Exceeded our expectations.', 'He is a great designer with good ideas and professional skills.', 'Awesome work, he was able to grasp the concept by reading my brief, all the logos and options hit the right spot. about:
Thanks for stopping by to my design portfolio. I am a designer, specifically the logo design with a unique design, intelligent visual images to present business and client needs. I try to make designs that work well in all colors and media (web and print needs).
  Of course I also provide services for business card design, email signatures, banners etc.

about: I graduated with a bachelor degree in Visual Communication Design”. More than one year I've worked in the company as a graphic designer. My responsibilities included poster and brochure design, label design for craft beer, preparing layouts for typography, development and design of outdoor advertising(banners), SMM.  Now I'm self-employed and specialize in logo design, identity design and branding. Beside that do small 2D animations and 3D motion designing.

about: My name is Abimael Alves, I've been a brand designer for just over 10 years, I've only been living fully for 5 years. I'm self-taught, from an early age I liked to discover new tools and something that was supposed to be just a pass time, became my source of income. about:
